tree.name: Kristaps Porzingis
tree.tradeDescription: Warriors traded Kuminga, Buddy Hield, and 2026 1st to Hawks for Porzingis

assetsGivenUp.name: Jonathan Kuminga
assetsGivenUp.note: G League Ignite forward, drafted 7th overall by GSW using pick acquired from Minnesota in Andrew Wiggins trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 MIN 1st Round Pick (top-3 protected)
assetsGivenUp.note: Acquired from Minnesota in Andrew Wiggins trade, conveyed as #7 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: Buddy Hield
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 6-team sign-and-trade: GSW sent Klay Thompson to DAL, received Hield from PHI and Anderson from MIN
assetsGivenUp.note: Oklahoma guard, signed 2yr/$21M via first 6-team trade in NBA history

assetsGivenUp.name: Klay Thompson
assetsGivenUp.note: Washington State guard, drafted #11 overall by Golden State. 4x NBA champion, one of the greatest shooters in NBA history. Left via sign-and-trade to Dallas after 13 seasons.
